EmailTemplate.description: CC response for external customer password reset request
EmailTemplate.name: MCS password reset (All products) Step 1
EmailTemplate.subject: MCS password reset (All products) Step 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
Please use the below link to reset your password using our self-service process:
Your username is: <{!Case.SuppliedEmail}>
Your password must be at least 8 characters long and include: - one upper case letter - one lower case letter - one number - one symbol.
Please ensure you delete your cookies, history and cache before resetting your password. Avoid using auto-fill functionality and instead manually type your username.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care Support Portal
